data.title: Julia Roberts: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Julia Roberts: Check out the list of all Julia Roberts movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Julia Roberts news on Times of India.
data.text:
Woman takes sweet revenge on Louis Vuitton staff for insult: Netizens call it vengeance of the year

etimes.in / Aug 22, 2024, 23:16 (IST)

A Chinese woman felt humiliated at a Louis Vuitton store in June. Returning with 600,000 yuan in cash two months later, she made the staff count the money before leaving without purchasing anything. The incident went viral, igniting debates about the attitudes of luxury brand employees.

Julia Roberts and Husband Danny Moder enjoy Wimbledon date after 22nd anniversary celebration

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 15:14 (IST)

​Julia Roberts and her husband, Danny Moder, had a delightful date at the 2024 Wimbledon men’s singles final, shortly after celebrating their 22nd wedding anniversary. The couple was spotted looking happy and in love at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club in London on Sunday. In a photo shared on Julia's Instagram, the 56-year-old "Pretty Woman" star is seen holding onto her husband, Danny, 55, as they enjoyed the tennis match

George Clooney asks US President Joe Biden to end campaign for a second term in White House

AP / Jul 11, 2024, 06:06 (IST)

ctor George Clooney, one of the Democratic Party's leading fundraisers, on Wednesday called for President Joe Biden to end his faltering campaign for a second term in the White House. "Top Democrats -- Chuck Schumer, Hakeem Jeffries, Nancy Pelosi -- and senators, representatives and other candidates who face losing in November need to ask this president to voluntarily step aside," Clooney wrote.

Eric Roberts shares thoughts on talking about his famous family despite their wishes

etimes.in / Jul 10, 2024, 11:49 (IST)

​Eric Roberts, known for his role in 'The Dark Knight,' shared on the 'Still Here Hollywood' podcast on July 8th that he is not supposed to discuss his famous family but sometimes does so anyway. When host Steve Kmetko inquired about his sister, Julia Roberts, Eric indicated that one would have to ask her directly. He explained that he loved his sister but was unable to talk about her because she did not want him to

Julia Roberts and Danny Moder celebrate 22 years of marriage

etimes.in / Jul 05, 2024, 14:47 (IST)

Julia Roberts and cinematographer Danny Moder celebrate 22 years of marriage, their love marked by a private 2002 ceremony in New Mexico. Julia's Instagram post captured their enduring connection. Their bond, sparked on set, blossomed with twins and a son. Julia admires Danny's intellect and kindness, citing his support in their professional collaborations. She cherishes homemaking alongside her Hollywood career.

Emma Roberts reveals why she hasn't collaborated with aunt Julia Roberts yet

etimes.in / Jul 06, 2024, 11:54 (IST)

Emma Roberts recently opened up about why she hasn't worked with her famous aunt, Julia Roberts, despite her interest in doing so. Emma, known for her role in "Space Cadet," told that the opportunity to work with Julia hasn't come up yet because they haven't found the right project. She explained that although she admires her aunt's work and would love to collaborate, the timing and project haven't aligned. Emma Roberts, who often faces scrutiny due to her family connections in Hollywood, discussed her desire to work with Julia in a meaningful way

Emma Roberts calls aunt Julia's classics 'comfort' movies to watch

IANS / Jul 06, 2024, 11:52 (IST)

Actress Emma Roberts says she has downloaded her Oscar-winning aunt Julia Roberts' movies and watches them for comfort when she is by herself. When asked if the two might ever work together in a movie, Emma said "I would love to find the perfect project for me and my aunt, and I know that there will be something. But it's never been the right thing."

Celebrities who said “I Do” on July 4th!

etimes.in / Jul 05, 2024, 15:09 (IST)

Several Hollywood couples, including Julia Roberts & Danny Moder, Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis, and Billy Joel & Alexis Roderick, have tied the knot on the Fourth of July. From surprise ceremonies to fairy tale romances, these celebrities showcase the beauty of love and commitment. Each couple has a unique story that continues to inspire.

Julia Roberts and Travis Kelce's interaction at Taylor Swift's Eras Tour goes VIRAL; netizens think clip is "weird" - WATCH

etimes.in / Jul 03, 2024, 17:02 (IST)

The internet had a lot to say about Julia Roberts' video seemingly scratching Travis Kelce's chest during their meet up at Taylor Swift's Eras Tour in Dublin. While some reacted to the clip rather positively, others thought the actress' behaviour was rather 'weird'

Emma Roberts reveals witnessing aunt Julia Roberts' career and fame was 'really scary' for THIS reason

etimes.in / Jun 27, 2024, 19:06 (IST)

Emma Roberts, who began acting at nine, finds her aunt Julia Roberts' fame "really scary." Emma discussed the challenges of nepotism, the desire to carve her own path, and the intimidating nature of extreme fame. She highlighted the public's bias towards "nepo kids" and the harsher criticism faced by young women in the industry.

Julia Roberts teaming up with Luca Guadagnino for new movie 'After the Hunt'

PTI / Mar 27, 2024, 14:11 (IST)

One of the most beloved actors Julia Roberts headlines Luca Guadagnino's 'After the Hunt,' depicting a college professor grappling with her dark past after a student's accusation against a colleague. The project is helmed by Guadagnino and scripted by Nora Garrett. Roberts' latest endeavor follows her role in 'Leave the World Behind.'

75+ Happy Rose Day Messages, Greetings, Wishes and Quotes for 2024

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Feb 07, 2024, 08:00 (IST)

Celebrate the essence of love with a curated collection of Happy Rose Day messages, greetings, wishes, and quotes for 2024. From heartfelt expressions to poetic verses, this anthology encapsulates the spirit of affection and devotion. Explore messages for loved ones, greetings for partners, wishes for friends, and inspiring quotes to deepen connections and spread joy. Let these words serve as tokens of love, enriching Valentine's Week with boundless romance and heartfelt sentiments.

Julia Roberts confesses she's a spirited college mom

IANS / Dec 07, 2023, 16:10 (IST)

Julia Roberts shares rare photo of her twins and discusses her children's college experience. Roberts reveals that two of her three children are currently in college. She expresses her support for their schools and proudly wears their college colors. Roberts also mentions that her youngest son is enjoying being the only child at home but misses his siblings. Prior to the twins going to college, Roberts expressed her excitement for their new chapter and celebrates their birthdays.
